Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_3D_sample_effects_level

The function AIL_3D_sample_effects_level retrieves the current effects level of the given sample.

F32 AIL_3D_sample_effects_level(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to query.

Discussion

On most providers, setting the room type to ENVIRONMENT_GENERIC will turn off all room effects. On EAX and EAX 2, however, you still need to call this AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level to completely turn off all room effects.

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_room_type, AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level
Related Basic Types: F32, H3DSAMPLE, MILES_ROOM_TYPE
